Flooding shuts down Baglihar hydropower project in J&K
description: Operations at the Baglihar hydropower project's stage 1 in Jammu and Kashmir were halted due to flooding in the machine room. While stage 1 remains suspended for scheduled maintenance, stage 2, unaffected by the flooding, will continue to generate power. This allows for stage 2 to operate during the lean period when it would typically be closed.

title: Trump withdraws support for Chagos deal as four Chagossians land on disputed archipelago
description: US President Donald Trump has reversed his stance, withdrawing support for the UK's deal to transfer the Chagos Islands to Mauritius. description: India is set to "fully restore" its visa services in Bangladesh. This comes after a recent change in Bangladesh's political leadership. Aniruddha Das, a senior Indian consular official, confirmed the steps to fully restore services. Medical and double-entry visas are already being issued. Other categories, including travel visas, will also resume soon. This move signals a strengthening of India-Bangladesh relations.

description: Saudi Arabia and the UAE, once close allies, are now locked in open rivalry, impacting the Yemen war, cross-border trade, and regional flashpoints. This strategic split challenges core assumptions about Gulf stability and investor confidence. The dispute, fueled by economic competition and differing regional visions, is escalating with potential for proxy conflicts and business friction.

title: The great billing heist: How powerful 'delete' tool helped eateries hide crores from tax net
description: Tax investigators in Hyderabad have uncovered a powerful 'delete' function in restaurant billing software, enabling widespread sales suppression. This feature, allowing deletion of up to a month's sales history, has led to probes into numerous eateries, with some accused of evading taxes on crores annually. AI tools are aiding the crackdown.

title: Lakers legend Magic Johnson sends birthday message to Michael Jordan
description: Magic Johnson shared a heartfelt birthday message for Michael Jordan following 23XI Racing’s first Daytona 500 victory. Jordan called the win championship-like, yet celebration footage showing him interacting with Tyler Reddick’s young son sparked online debate. Reddick defended Jordan, saying critics misread the moment, while the milestone win remained a historic achievement for the NASCAR team.

title: NBA trade news: Warriors sign $60M Celtics big, skip Giannis chase
description: The Golden State Warriors have acquired Kristaps Porzingis from the Atlanta Hawks, trading away Jonathan Kuminga and Buddy Hield. This move aims to bolster the frontcourt and scoring after Jimmy Butler's season-ending injury. While Porzingis offers valuable spacing and shooting, his durability remains a significant concern for the team's playoff aspirations.
